Wooden Fishing Rod.name: Wooden Fishing Rod
Wooden Fishing Rod.description: A simple wooden rod with a line attached. Surprisingly effective for catching fish, despite looking like a stick.

Wooden Pickaxe.name: Wooden Pickaxe
Wooden Pickaxe.description: A wooden pickaxe that's actually held together by hope and determination. Don't swing too hard or it might splinter.

Wooden Axe.name: Wooden Axe
Wooden Axe.description: An axe made of wood. The irony is not lost on anyone who uses it.

Wooden Hoe.name: Wooden Hoe
Wooden Hoe.description: A trusty wooden hoe for tilling soil and harvesting crops. Farmers have sworn by this design for generations, mostly out of necessity.

Wooden Machete.name: Wooden Machete
Wooden Machete.description: A wooden machete for cutting through vegetation. More effective than you'd expect, but handle with care.

Wooden Dagger.name: Wooden Dagger
Wooden Dagger.description: A basic wooden dagger. Not very effective, but better than nothing.

Stone Fishing Rod.name: Stone Fishing Rod
Stone Fishing Rod.description: A robust fishing rod with a stone weight. Surprisingly balanced and far more durable than its wooden predecessor.

Stone Pickaxe.name: Stone Pickaxe
Stone Pickaxe.description: A solid stone pickaxe that gets the job done. Heavy, reliable, and makes satisfying contact with rock.

Stone Axe.name: Stone Axe
Stone Axe.description: A capable stone axe that cleaves through branches like butter. Your predecessors knew what they were doing.

Stone Hoe.name: Stone Hoe
Stone Hoe.description: A stone hoe that turns soil with excellent efficiency. Your crops will thank you.

Stone Machete.name: Stone Machete
Stone Machete.description: A keen-edged stone machete for clearing vegetation. Sharp enough to make quick work of the wilderness.
